name: Anna
title: The Rocket Artillery
subtitle: A massive ADC who devastates enemies with heavy rocket launcher attacks
lore: A formidable warrior who has mastered the art of heavy artillery combat, Anna wields a massive rocket launcher with deadly precision. Her combination of explosive firepower and tactical cunning makes her a feared presence on any battlefield. Despite her preference for long-range devastation, Anna is equally deadly up close with her arsenal of kunai and tactical kisses that charm and weaken her foes.

passive.name: Artillery Momentum
passive.description: Anna gains 10% bonus movement speed for each enemy hit by abilities for 5.5 seconds.

Q.name: Aimed Rocket
Q.description: Anna calls a rocket from the sky in a circular area at cursor location. On impact, deals [95/160/300/500/710 + 100% AD] damage. If the enemy is hit directly in the center, deals additional [65% AD] damage.

W.name: Tempting Kiss
W.description: Anna throws a kiss in a crescent shape in the targeted direction. Hit enemies are charmed for [1s] and take [50%] more damage from Anna during the effect.

E.name: Kunai Strike
E.description: Anna throws 6 kunai in a crescent shape in front of her, dealing [75% AD] damage. Hit enemies lose [55%] movement speed for [2s] and have their armor reduced by [12%].

R.name: Power Rocket
R.description: Anna fires a massive rocket in the targeted direction with infinite range. The first enemy hit takes [400/500/700-1000/1255/1580] damage based on distance traveled. This ability ignores enemy armor completely.

1.name: Precision Artillery
1.description: Anna's Q ability has 15% increased range and reduces its cooldown by 1s if it hits the center of the target area (regardless of hitting enemies).

1.name: Mobile Artillery
1.description: Anna's passive movement speed bonus is increased to 15% per enemy hit, and using any ability grants 25% movement speed for 2 seconds.

1.name: Tactical Positioning
1.description: Anna heals for 3% of her maximum health for each enemy champion hit by her abilities. Additionally, she gains 15% damage reduction for 3 seconds after using Power Rocket.

5.name: Artillery Barrage
5.description: Anna's Aimed Rocket now fires 3 rockets in a triangular pattern. Each rocket deals 75% damage, but hitting the same target with multiple rockets increases damage by 50% per additional hit.

5.name: Explosive Ordinance
5.description: Power Rocket leaves a burning crater that deals 15% of Anna's AD as damage per second for 8 seconds.

5.name: Tactical Supremacy
5.description: Aimed Rocket can now be cast twice within 4 seconds. The second cast deals 150% damage.

10.name: Nuclear Warhead
10.description: Power Rocket explodes in a massive 800-unit radius on impact, dealing 60% of the original damage to all enemies in the area. The primary target still takes full damage and the explosion ignores 20% of enemy resistances.

10.name: Supersonic Payload
10.description: Power Rocket travels 3x faster and pierces through all enemies in its path. Each enemy hit increases the damage by 30% (max 150% bonus damage).

15.name: Tactical Overload
15.description: Anna can store up to 2 charges of each basic ability (Q, W, E). Charges recharge at 150% of the normal cooldown rate.

15.name: Battlefield Control
15.description: Anna's abilities apply 'Artillery Mark' to enemies for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 12% more damage from Anna.

15.name: Combat Engineer
15.description: Anna gains 12% spell vamp from all abilities.

20.name: Weapons of Mass Destruction
20.description: Anna's Q abilities now have global range and can be cast anywhere on the map.

20.name: Artillery Commander
20.description: Anna can designate a 1200-unit radius 'Artillery Zone' that lasts 15 seconds (60s cooldown). Within this zone, Anna's abilities cost no mana, have 75% reduced cooldowns, and deal 50% more damage.

20.name: Unstoppable Arsenal
20.description: Anna becomes immune to crowd control effects and gains 40% damage reduction.

20.name: Heavy Ordnance
20.description: Anna's autoattacks now scale with 200% AD instead of standard 100%.
